results.name: Greatest prime factor of n^3-1.
link: R. J. Mathar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..1000
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(f=factor(n^3-1)); f[#f~,1] \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 08 2017
xref: Cf. A096175 n^3-1 is an odd semiprime, A096176 (n^3-1)/(n-1) is prime.
